tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I met Dr. Rinku Sengupta for my 2nd pregnancy. My colleague had recommended her as I was looking for a reliable one after a horrific experience with my previous doctor during my first delivery. 

She was calm and patiently heard me and gave me all the right advice.  
Despite having C- section for my first pregnancy, she suggested and guided me that if I keep my weight in check and keep my a healthy routine,  I can have normal deliver. I tried my level best to follow her advice and it happened.  I delivered normally. She waited for things to happen for hours and kept me also motivated and positive.  There was one point where in I had given up but it was her motivation that kept me going. She is an angel and true to her profession.  A very dedicated and hard working person who tries her level best to reach out to her patients to help them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rinku has been an brilliant choice for my 1st pregnancy and has a great word of mouth credibility for normal deliveries. I don't think I would have had a normal delivery without her guidance, patience and support during labor- she kept my spirits high, didn't let me give up after 17hrs of labor (baby was born in the 19th) and explained the procedures to make me comfortable. Right from sound & timely advice, to educating me & my husband on next steps to also guiding us on legit yoga/lamaze workshops- she's been resourceful and of course kept standards high for exercise & fitness where I tended to slack :) It's rare to find a great combination of expertise and empathy in this field and she aces both. She is also open to feedback. I am glad I made the right choice and highly recommend her :)

tags: None
review: You deal with the very complicated and delicate matter of a woman's life...I expect bit of care, sympathy/empathy or connect with your patients...Am I asking for too much? You're a Dr with vast experience and a woman. Will it hurt you make your aged, 1st time pregnant patient to feel comfortable and confident? And when at 2nd visit she gets to know that there are complications in her pregnancy to be bit assuring that you will do everything possible in your power to make things better? You might be best at what you do but I didn't feel the care, connect and assurance...

tags: None
review: doctor nobody should prefer.  one expects doctor to be available and reachable during delicate phase of pregnancy but she is never reachable. She always make you wait for more than 1.5hours and then doesn't give you enough time during consultation. doesn't give answer to your queries, infact she gets irritated if you ask anything. sitaram bhartia hospital boast about their hospital for normal delivery and Dr Rinku Sengupta particularly for vbac *** *** ** **** *** **** *** **** ** ** ******* ********* *** ********* it's a very very expensive hospital, you pay so much *** ******** *************** ********** *** Rude behaviour of doctors and staff.  ** *** ***** **** ** ******* **** ** ****** ****** ** ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr. Rinku Sengupta for delivery at 34th week of Pregnancy.

*** ***** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ************** *** **** ************ She was recommended by my previous doctor for the delivery of my twins. 
At first, I was skeptical about changing my doctor near the end of the pregnancy. But in the first meeting, I was convinced and got confidence in her. That she would efficiently take control of the rest of my pregnancy journey. 
She is very humble, soft spoken and answers all your queries. 
Initially she was preparing us for the normal delivery of my twins. But at my 36th week of pregnancy, the position of my babies was not convenient for normal delivery. I
really appreciate her decision to opt for a C-section at 36th week of pregnancy. I gave birth to a healthy Baby Boy and a Girl. 

During the C-section, I was totally conscious and witnessed the whole process. There was a shortage of other doctors during the operation due to other emergency cases.
Despite being the HOD Doctor, Dr. Rinky Sengupta single handedly delivered my twin babies and did all the stitching herself. All this has induced immense respect for her and her caliber.

Dr. Rinku Sengupta is really God sent for me and my family. I am very lucky to have the right doctor at the right time.

Thank you Dr. Rinku Sengupta.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Contraception Advice,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,
review:
I have been consulting Dr. Rinku Sengupta for the last 1.5 years.  I had an irregular menstruation cycle and related health issues.  My prolactin level was shooting up every 3-4 months. One of my friends recommended Dr. Rinku. She helped me get my cycle regular and I conceived naturally within 6 months.
During my pregnancy journey, she guided me throughout and answered every question that I asked. She not only gave proper treatment and managed the pregnancy from the very beginning, but also she motivated me to remain positive during pregnancy. She also counselled me well to try for normal delivery instead of going for a caesarian. She prescribed only the required medicine and focused on a natural diet and exercise rather than supplements. 
I did not have labour pain even after 40 weeks of gestation. Dr. Rinku induced labour and I gave birth to my little angel through normal delivery at Rainbow Hospital on 9 Dec 2022. Her team was indeed very supportive and encouraging during the labour.
I am really thankful to Dr. Rinku Sengupta for giving me the best gift and supporting me throughout the pregnancy journey.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,Prenatal Checkup,
review:
Dr. Rinku don't talk much, may b she doesn't seem friendly and nice in the beginning especially if your pregnancy is going normal and there are no red flags.  However she knows her work well. She is highly professional and delivery what she and hospital claims- "Normal Delivery".  If you dream of having normal delivery please see any gynecologist of this hospital. You will not feel that u r in India where urban families have accepted the truth that normal delivery is a past thing. Charges for hospitalization are kind of high but worth it. Not only doctors but their is staff is amazing. I delivered my bundle of joy 3 months back with the great team of doctors and Sister Rita George and Sister Anju.  I am thankful to Dr. Rinku for keeping my enthusiasm high for the normal delivery and I can't thank Sister Rita George and Sister Anju enough for being such a support during the active labor time. They were so fantastic at most difficult time.
Best of luck and remember humans are supposed to deliver babies normally just like all other animals on this planet.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Both my kids are born under Dr Rinkuâ€™s consult and have had a happy healthy journey towards embracing us as parents. Sheâ€™s especially been there for us when we were going through a rough phase during my second pregnancy. I was detected with gall stones and had episodes of intense pain during my 8th month of pregnancy. She was always there even during odd hours, before and even after my pregnancy to guide me towards comfort. Cant thank my stars enough to have chosen Dr Rinku. A very sharp and experienced doctor. She is a blessing for any lady going through pregnancy and pregnancy related issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I consulted Dr Rinku for my first pregnancy and she remained my doctor throughout my pregnancy. I was so satisfied and happy with her consultation that I didn't go to any other gynecologists when my family wanted me to take a second opinion. She was recommended to me by a friend and I feel lucky to have consulted her during my entire pregnancy. She is an amazing doctor and human being. She is a non-sense doctor, she doesn't scare you with unnecessary medications or tests. She has such a motherly vibe around her. The best part is she is always available on the phone if you have any health issues- fever, or allergies, and she instantly advises you.  I CAN'T THANK HER ENOUGH for helping me bring my baby girl into the world. She was AMAZING support during the labor when you are the weakest and you need a mental and emotional lift, she will be right beside you!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Normal delivery is a physiological process, but it is practiced very rarely nowadays. Once, I had seen Dr.Rinku Sen Gupta Dhar online in a workshop organized by the BMJ in which she promoted normal vaginal delivery. Since then, I made my mind that in my second pregnancy, by the grace of Almighty, I will surely go to Dr.Rinku Sen Gupta for VBAC. In my very first visit, she stressed upon exercises which specifically helps in promoting VBAC. Dr. Rinku was like an angel to me during my labor. I was amazed to see how much effort Dr. Rinku and her staff were putting in. I was blessed with a baby boy on September 2 2022, via VBAC (Vaginal Birth After Cesarean). I had a Ceasarean earlier. I will highly recommend Dr Rinku Sengupta Dhar for VBAC.
*** ** *** **** ** *** ******

context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Delivery,
review:
I was fortunate enough to come across Dr. Rinku Sengupta at the time when we were concerned to find a good gynaecologist. After our first check-up, I was pretty convinced that she was the perfect doctor for us. As time passed, I sailed through my pregnancy journey quite smoothly with her steadfast guidance. She  counseled me to have positive thoughts regarding natural birth, even when I was almost on the verge of giving up during my labour. Now, after three weeks of my delivery, I can truly appreciate her advice. I am as healthy as before and can continue with my daily chores with ease.
Last but not the least I shall always recommend her to motherâ€™s to be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
Choosing to be under the treatment of Dr. Rinku Sengupta before, during and after my pregnancy has proved to be an awesome decision for us. She's one of the finest and most talented obstetrician one can find in these times. Her straightforward approach, excellent expertise, encouragement and professionalism are incredible! Ma'am has been a boon for us and we can't thank her enough for being the amazing doctor and human she is! 
Not to forget to mention, Sister Leeya at Rainbow Hospital who's impeccable at her work and was soo very compassionate.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: hiI have known Dr. Rinku for the last 10 years . she is a great doctor and am really happy that both the deliveries are done by her . i was on insulins both times . she helped me throughout and did virginal delivery without any epidural. she was there , available and made me feel that i can do it .i recommend her 500% . *** ***** ***** *********** ********* ** ***** * please see her if you have any gynecologist related issues. *** ** *** **** ****** ** **** **

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ***** *** ** wen I was expecting my first baby..I always had a medical phobia and visiting hospitals were all tough for me. But Sitaram was like a home .. the environment there is v homely . My dr Rinku was v helpful n supportive till date. I have shifted to greater noida but whenever I will b due for my 2nd issue ; I will always consider her...thanks

tags: None
review:
Dr. Rinku is one of the most honest and no-nonsense attitude doctor who can make things happen if you work along with her during the course of your pregnancy!
At first, one may find her little tough, but after 2-3 visits one starts finding her encouraging, supportive and just a phone call away. 
In our family many people have had great experiences with her.

And most important!! If you want a normal delivery in these days She IS the One!!

- Sneha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
More than a appreciation note it's a thank you note for Dr. Rinku, *** ** *** ** *** **** **** *** ***** **** ****
I still remember the first day I met her and she said pregancy is not  a disease it's a natural process, go with flow, your body will tell you what it needs. She has always been just a ping away, being a first time mom , I had so many queries and she was always there to answer all of them. She ensures you have a healthy lifestyle during pregancy which includes walking, yoga, meditation and healthy diet. My pregancy journey was very smooth all thanks to her.
I had a normal virginal delivery and delivered a healthy baby all credits to Doc, at one point I had given up, but Dr. Rinku said just give me 2 hr, putting all our trust in her,  she ensured both baby and mother are fine.

We highly recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We highly recommend Dr. Rinku. Both our kids were delivered normal under her able guidance. She explained the health conditions well and believe in the natural process more than too much medication.

She is no doubt expert in normal delivery. Many of my colleagues in office recommended me to go for her for normal delivery. I am going to choose her anytime for my future deliveries as well. - Swati M.

Thank you Doctor and your teamðŸ˜Š

I had a wonderful journey with Dr. Rinku Sengupta while my pregnancy. It was an awesome experience with her as she was so supportive and explained everything so clearly which makes things easy for you.

I would highly recommend her to all Couples who wants to go through  normal delivery. She is the BEST Gyny i have ever met.

Thank you so much Dr. for your all help and support. 

Lots of Love!!!
Usha Bist

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Rinku is a seasoned professional,  knowledgable and aware. She counsels her patients with the right kind of information and creates an awareness that is required and necessary. Her approach should not be misunderstood as harsh. She develops the relationship with her patient by gradually and mutually showing the way ahead, which in many cases are the first time experiences for the patient.
